languages.text: Бойцы планетарного гарнизона, подготовленные почтенным Абеляром Версерианом, быстро освоили премудрость богопротивных еретиков. Переняв их тактику, они действовали в джунглях малыми группами, маскируясь и нанося внезапные удары. Повстанцы, лишенные своего главного тактического преимущества, были уничтожены или отступили в малозначимые островные районы.

traits.locale_text: Бойцы сил планетарной обороны, подготовленные почтенным Абеляром Версерианом, быстро освоили премудрость богопротивных еретиков. Переняв их тактику, они действовали в джунглях малыми группами, маскируясь и нанося внезапные удары. Повстанцы, лишенные своего главного тактического преимущества, были уничтожены или отступили в малозначимые островные районы.

languages.text: The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.
languages.original_text: Бойцы планетарного гарнизона, подготовленные почтенным Абеляром Версерианом, быстро освоили премудрость богопротивных еретиков. Переняв их тактику, они действовали в джунглях малыми группами, маскируясь и нанося внезапные удары. Повстанцы, лишенные своего главного тактического преимущества, были уничтожены или отступили в малозначимые островные районы.

traits.locale_text: The soldiers of the planetary defense forces were trained by the esteemed Abelard Verserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

The soldiers of the planetary defense forces were trained by the esteemed Abelard Verserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

languages.text: 惑星守備隊の兵たちは尊敬捧げられしアベラルド・ウェルザリアンの訓練を受け、謀反を起こした異端者の戦術をすぐに習得した。異端者たちの戦術を利用する兵たちは小集団に分かれてジャングルへと移動し、身を隠したまま異端者の急襲に対応した。異端者側に戦術上の主な利点はなくなり、掃討しきれなかった反乱軍は重要性の低い離島地域へと退却した。
languages.original_text: The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

traits.locale_text: 惑星守備隊の兵たちは尊敬捧げられしアベラルド・ウェルザリアンの訓練を受け、謀反を起こした異端者の戦術をすぐに習得した。異端者たちの戦術を利用する兵たちは小集団に分かれてジャングルへと移動し、身を隠したまま異端者の急襲に対応した。異端者側に戦術上の主な利点はなくなり、掃討しきれなかった反乱軍は重要性の低い離島地域へと退却した。

languages.text: 行星驻军士兵接受了德高望重的阿贝拉德·韦尔森的训练，很快吸收了那些无信异端分子的知识。士兵们借鉴了敌人的战术，以小队为单位在丛林中移动，保持隐蔽，发动袭击。叛军失去了主要的战术优势，伤亡惨重。那些尚未被消灭的叛军撤退到了经济意义不大的岛屿地区。
languages.original_text: The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

traits.locale_text: 行星驻军士兵接受了德高望重的阿贝拉德·韦尔森的训练，很快吸收了那些无信异端分子的知识。士兵们借鉴了敌人的战术，以小队为单位在丛林中移动，保持隐蔽，发动袭击。叛军失去了主要的战术优势，伤亡惨重。那些尚未被消灭的叛军撤退到了经济意义不大的岛屿地区。

languages.text: Los soldados de la guarnición planetaria fueron instruidos por el estimado Abelard Werserian y rápidamente asimilaron los conocimientos de los herejes. Utilizando sus tácticas, los soldados atravesaron la jungla en grupos reducidos, permaneciendo ocultos y lanzando ataques relámpago. Privados de su principal ventaja táctica, los pocos rebeldes que no fueron eliminados tuvieron que retirarse a regiones insulares de escaso valor.
languages.original_text: The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

traits.locale_text: Los soldados de la guarnición planetaria fueron instruidos por el estimado Abelard Werserian y rápidamente asimilaron los conocimientos de los herejes. Utilizando sus tácticas, los soldados atravesaron la jungla en grupos reducidos, permaneciendo ocultos y lanzando ataques relámpago. Privados de su principal ventaja táctica, los pocos rebeldes que no fueron eliminados tuvieron que retirarse a regiones insulares de escaso valor.

languages.text: Die Soldaten der Garnison des Planeten wurden von dem geschätzten Abelard Werserian ausgebildet und erlangten rasch das Wissen der gottlosen Ketzer. Mit deren Taktiken zogen die Soldaten in kleinen Gruppen durch den Dschungel, blieben versteckt und griffen plötzlich an. Ihres größten taktischen Vorteils beraubt, zogen die Rebellen, die nicht ausgelöscht wurden, sich in Inselregionen ohne Bedeutung zurück.
languages.original_text: The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

traits.locale_text: Die Soldaten der Garnison des Planeten wurden von dem geschätzten Abelard Werserian ausgebildet und erlangten rasch das Wissen der gottlosen Ketzer. Mit deren Taktiken zogen die Soldaten in kleinen Gruppen durch den Dschungel, blieben versteckt und griffen plötzlich an. Ihres größten taktischen Vorteils beraubt, zogen die Rebellen, die nicht ausgelöscht wurden, sich in Inselregionen ohne Bedeutung zurück.

languages.text: Grâce à la formation prodiguée par l'honorable Abélard Werserian, les soldats de la garnison planétaire purent rapidement absorber les connaissances des hérétiques. Empruntant les tactiques de leurs ennemis, les soldats se déplacèrent dans la jungle en petits groupes, restant dissimulés tout du long et lançant uniquement des attaques-éclairs. Désormais privés de leur principal avantage stratégique, les quelques rebelles survivants se replièrent vers des îles sans grande valeur.
languages.original_text: The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à la formation prodiguée par l'honorable Abélard Werserian, les soldats de la garnison planétaire purent rapidement absorber les connaissances des hérétiques. Empruntant les tactiques de leurs ennemis, les soldats se déplacèrent dans la jungle en petits groupes, restant dissimulés tout du long et lançant uniquement des attaques-éclairs. Désormais privés de leur principal avantage stratégique, les quelques rebelles survivants se replièrent vers des îles sans grande valeur.

languages.text: Gezegen garnizonu askerleri, saygıdeğer Abelard Werserian önderliğinde eğitim görüp sapkın kâfirlere dair bilgileri hızla özümsediler. İsyancıların taktiklerini benimseyen askerler, küçük gruplar hâlinde ormanda hareket ediyor ve gizlenerek ani saldırılar düzenliyorlardı. Artık avantajlı konumlarından mahrum kalan isyancılar, adaların önemsiz bölgelerine çekilmek zorunda kaldı.
languages.original_text: The soldiers of the planetary garrison were trained by the esteemed Abelard Werserian and quickly absorbed the knowledge of the ungodly heretics. Borrowing their tactics, the soldiers moved through the jungle in small groups, staying hidden and dealing sudden strikes. Now stripped of their main tactical advantage, those rebels who were not wiped out retreated to island regions of little significance.

traits.locale_text: Gezegen garnizonu askerleri, saygıdeğer Abelard Werserian önderliğinde eğitim görüp sapkın kâfirlere dair bilgileri hızla özümsediler. İsyancıların taktiklerini benimseyen askerler, küçük gruplar hâlinde ormanda hareket ediyor ve gizlenerek ani saldırılar düzenliyorlardı. Artık avantajlı konumlarından mahrum kalan isyancılar, adaların önemsiz bölgelerine çekilmek zorunda kaldı.
